text: Nilanka Rukshitha (born 29 August 1998) is a Sri Lankan cricketer. He made his Twenty20 debut for Galle Cricket Club in the 2017–18 SLC Twenty20 Tournament on 25 February 2018. He made his List A debut for Galle Cricket Club in the 2017–18 Premier Limited Overs Tournament on 10 March 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Galle Cricket Club cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Nilanka Rukshitha
